mods.name: Tameable Cougar
mods.author: LiterallySomeCat
mods.description: Adds ability to tame cougars using the GOAP bait and a snare, similar to wolves.

files.pak: the direct download URL for your PAK mod file
files.exmodz: the direct download URL for your EXMODZ mod file

mods.imageURL: A direct download URL to an image that will be displayed in the mod list (optional)
mods.readmeURL: A link to the 'raw' version of your mod's README
